name: Walking
description: The gateway drug to fitness. Side effects include unexpected tan lines and judging elevator users.

name: Bodyweight Squats
description: Standing up and sitting down repeatedly until people ask if you're okay.

name: Push-ups
description: Repeatedly hugging the ground until your arms forgive you.

name: Dumbbell Training
description: Picking up heavy things and putting them down. Revolutionary stuff.

name: Kettlebell Swings
description: Like playing catch with yourself, but the ball is trying to dislocate your shoulders.

name: Deadlifts
description: The art of picking up heavy things while your face looks like you're defusing a bomb.

name: Burpees
description: A push-up, jump squat, and existential crisis all rolled into one movement.

name: Weighted Muscle-ups
description: Pull-ups that got too full of themselves.

name: Seafloor Sprints
description: Air didn't provide enough resistance, so you're using the ocean.

name: Mountain Range Circuit
description: Nothing like a quick jog up Everest to start the day.

name: Car Curls
description: Using compact cars for XL biceps. Your gym's parking lot is suspiciously empty.

name: Train Pull
description: The morning commute is delayed because you're using the train for your back workout.

name: Power Plant Cardio
description: Running so fast the turbines can't keep up. You're now the city's main power source.

name: Pyramid Push-ups
description: Using ancient wonders as workout props. Egyptian gods are taking notes.

name: Grand Canyon Crunches
description: Each rep carves a new natural wonder. The National Park Service is running out of brochures.

name: Volcano Kettlebell Swings
description: Swinging active volcanoes for reps. Bonus points if you don't cause an extinction event.

name: Tectonic Plate Press
description: Bench pressing continents. Geologists are having a meltdown.

name: Black Hole Resistance Training
description: When regular gravity just isn't challenging enough anymore.

name: Quantum Superposition Cardio
description: Simultaneously running in every possible direction. Schr√∂dinger's workout.

name: Big Bang Burpees
description: Each rep creates and destroys a universe. The ultimate full-body workout.
